name: Shedinja
author: Tomokazu Komiya
flavor_text: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.

abilities.name: Shell Survival
abilities.effect: Put this Pokémon into play only with the effect of Ninjask’s Cast-Off Shell Ability. (When you are setting up to play, you cannot put it face down as your Active Pokémon or on your Bench.)

attacks.name: Life Squeeze
attacks.effect: Put damage counters on your opponent’s Active Pokémon until its remaining HP is 10.
